basic.description:
Corresponds to 4U AFIC. Functions and their graphs, limits, derivatives.
NOTE    This course may not be included in any MATH or STAT plan.
RECOMMENDATION    Ontario Grade 11 Mathematics or equivalent.
basic.subject: MATH
basic.title: Introduction to Calculus

extra.enrollment_requirement:
RECOMMENDATION     Ontario Grade 11 Mathematics.
ONE- WAY EXCLUSION   May not be taken with or after: MATH120; MATH121; MATH122; MATH123; MATH124; MATH126.
